Docs.summary: An enumeration that describes the mode of an input device.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.InputMode Disabled = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The device is disabled and will not report any events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.InputMode Screen = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The device is enabled. The device's coordinate space maps to the entire screen.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.InputMode Window = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The device is enabled. The device's coordinate space is mapped to a single window. The manner in which this window is chosen is undefined, but it will typically be the same way in which the focus window for key events is determined.
